sentences.en: A unit composed of an assemblage of pieces welded together.
sentences.cn: 自行车上的零部件得焊接在一起.

sentences.en: Are rank - abundance distributions a useful tool of assemblage discrimination in tropical moths?
sentences.cn: 秩 —— 丰盛度分布是热带蛾类集合判别的有用工具 吗 ?

sentences.en: Authigenic mineral assemblage formed in different ambients is distinct to each other.
sentences.cn: 两种环境下形成的自生矿物组合截然不同.

sentences.en: Envision the conductor as an assemblage of driven , damped oscillators.
sentences.cn: 把导体看成是大量受迫阻尼振动的振子的集合.

sentences.en: Faunal assemblage are directly related to the depositional environment.
sentences.cn: 动物群落与沉积环境有直接关系.

sentences.en: He had an assemblage of old junk cars filling the backyard.
sentences.cn: 他的后院里堆满了废旧汽车。

sentences.en: Mr. King was one of the assemblage.
Old thing , good appearance, bad assemblage technique, not good as showing the single lance head.
sentences.cn: 东西老, 品相好,攒的技术太劣, 不如单展示矛头效果好.

sentences.en: Table 3 summarizes the properties of the masonry assemblage and its constituents.
sentences.cn: 表3总结了砌体组合及其成员的属性.

sentences.en: The record section shows an assemblage of such traces side by side.
sentences.cn: 把这些道并排地集合起来,就是记录剖面.

sentences.en: The room was soon filled with a motley assemblage.
sentences.cn: 不多一会儿,屋子里便挤满了形形色色的来开会的人.

sentences.en: The strength of the assemblage is bond - strength limited.
sentences.cn: 纤维集合体的强力受粘合强力的限制.

sentences.en: These changes reflect the effects of burial diagenesis on the originally deposited clay mineral assemblage.
sentences.cn: 这种变化反映了埋藏成岩作用对原来沉积的粘土矿物组合的影响.

sentences.en: This combination process is called the assemblage of stiffness matrices.
sentences.cn: 这种组合的过程称为刚度矩阵的装配.

sentences.en: Tropical rainforests have the most varied assemblage of plants in the world.
sentences.cn: 热带雨林集聚了世界上种类最繁多的植物。

words.tran_cn: 汇编程序；汇编机；装配工
[机]装配；[古]集合；聚集；集会；集合物；聚集的物或人

trans.tran_cn: 装配，聚集，（聚集在一起的）一堆东西，组合成的艺术品
trans.tran_en: a group of things collected together
